title: Cloak and dagger
creator_credit: United States Pictures, Milton Sperling and Fritz Lang
brief_description: Gary Cooper is an American science professor, parachuted into war torn Nazi Germany to obtain military secrets. The deeper he probes, the deadlier his mission becomes, especially when his involvement with the mysterious Gina (Lilli Palmer) catapults him into a whirlpool of danger, betrayal and murder.
